relation: Convenience operator overloads for query construction
New query flags and improved handling of full text matching scores including sorting
Allow getting and setting the size of the pixmap cache in KImageCache
Allow SVGs to use systemcolors before rendering
DeclarativeWidget to load QML scenes in Plasma
finish up the gsoc project about Plasma::Storage service
let Plasma::SVG find the best matching size hinted element if there is no exact match
GUI elements for resource/file searching including faceted browsing
Sync library to be used in BackupSync, Strigi, Akonadi, WebExtractor and Removable Media
Add more possible synchronization primitives to KSharedDataCache to expand OS support. POSIX Semaphores Contributed by Alberto Villa of the FreeBSD project. Windows support may still occur as well.
Add fallback to QCache in KSharedDataCache.
Add ability to make KSharedDataCache strictly read-only for laptop support.
Allow to hide icons in menus
Add astronomical calculation support classes and astronomical based calendars.
Add api for first/last day of year/month.
New convenience class to make date localization easy.
Add default colour to optionally display negative numbers.
Full POSIX compliant format support for date, time, numbers and money, including but not limited to: traditional/US week numbers, AM/PM symbols, number grouping
Implement separate backends for each supported platform/desktop to use platform localization in place of KDE locale.
Implement support for Country Code sub-regions and other country code standard conversions.
New domain specific cookie policy based on patch provided in bug#54300
Make KWallet::Wallet use the secrets-service API
Allow to build without deprecated symbols
Kevin Ottens (with lots of support from David Faure)
pageTitle: Difference between revisions of "Schedules/KDE4/4.6 Feature Plan" - KDE TechBase

Weekends. etc. John Layt <john@layt.net> IN PROGRESS libplasma Make Calendar DataEngine a Service.
